byline.original: By RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr. and ASHLEY PARKER

abstract: Mitt Romney has softened his critical stance on flat-tax plans as his rivals in Republican primary raise it as an issue.
snippet: Though an early critic of flat-tax plans, Mitt Romney appeared to soften as rivals make it an issue. But experts say such plans rarely survive serious scrutiny.
lead_paragraph: Though an early critic of flat-tax plans, Mitt Romney appeared to soften as rivals make it an issue. But experts say such plans rarely survive serious scrutiny.

headline.main: Romney, Once a Critic, Hedges on Flat-Tax Plans
headline.print_headline: Romney, Once a Critic, Hedges on Flat-Tax Plans
headline.seo: Dynamics of G.O.P. Race Spur Romney to Hedge on Flat Tax
